Text: It is shameful the UK Government won't condemn Trump.Now is the time to speak up for justice and equality.#BlackLivesMatter #JusticeForGeorgeFloyd

The Trump regime declared Antifa a terrorist organisation and then declared all protestors Antifa; this is a move to legitimise killing civilians. Trump has defined the terms of engagement of the Civil War he is inciting, it is not Black vs White it is Fascist vs Antifascist.

The best way to judge @realDonaldTrump's performance today?Look at how the media is responding.They are foaming at the mouth with rage and are trying to lie about itThat means Trump knocked it out of the fucking park

Word is Gov delaying report into BAME people and #COVID19 is due to #GeorgeFloydProtests. Surely this movement confronts the lack of urgency in tackling racial inequalities. We must release the report now and act fast. We owe it to those have already passed. #BlackLivesMatterUK

Being a black Brit is watching the country up in arms about Dominic Cummings driving to Durham, but not seeing similar outrage over the delay of a report investigating why you are 4X more like to die from Covid19. #ReleaseTheReport

now that trump's done a photo op with a bible as a publicity stunt while he blinds civilians with 40mms, it is a good time to remember that jesus christ himself would have metaphorically backhanded our cheeto in chief https://t.co/j74WZIWecH

THREAD We feared and expected that far too many people with learning disabilities are dying far too early due to Covid19. CQC data published today confirms this https://t.co/iIrhNFcUcO. A short thread as I take this in. 1/13
The Republican Party is run by Donald Trump, who is a racist. Everyone has a perfect right to do whatever they want with that information, but it is factual.

two girls (trump supporters) pretended to be part of the protest in Madison, WI and destroyed property. The first picture was taken when a black man took them aside to explain how they were hurting the movement. Now we know their actions were intentional. https://t.co/2oLOcE1sgH
